name: Jumpy Bird (Exuin, Nomspot, Bentot, Sakata, IronSteel games)

description:
Use the arrow keys to move! Collect coins and avoid the lava and spikes! Tip - you can jump twiceif you get 3000+ score dm me at Sakata#4545 at discord with ss there has a special prize for you Credits
